column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After a long week , I decided on a whim to take a bath .
#text=It had been years since I last took one ; I honestly could n't remember the last time .
#text=As soon as I got home from work , I kicked off my shoes , and walked excitedly up to the master bathroom .
#text=I plugged the tub , and started running the water .
#text=I adjusted the temperature until it was just right : not too hot , not too cold , just warm and comfortable .
#text=After a few drops of the bath liquid , bubbles filled the tub as the floral aroma filled the air .
#text=I slowly took off the last of my garments , finally free from everything .
#text=I quickly grabbed a glass of wine and when I returned , the tub was full and ready .
#text=I slipped into the tub and soaked in the bliss .
#text=I lounged for what seemed like hours .
#text=Before I knew it , the wine was gone and I was starting to prune .
#text=I got out and dried the last of the relaxing water off of my body as the last of the bath went down the drain .
#text=Though my bath was over , I felt the relaxing affects for hours .
